title: Wear Light Meter
summary: Simple app that displays current illumination
description: This app reads data from the ambient light sensor and displays it absolute value (SI Lux).IMPORTANT: This application requires ambient light sensor, at the moment it is installed only in Motorola Moto 360 and Sony Smartwatch 3.
descriptionHTML:
This app reads data from the ambient light sensor and displays it absolute value (SI Lux).
IMPORTANT: This application requires ambient light sensor, at the moment it is installed only in Motorola Moto 360 and Sony Smartwatch 3.
comments: Might be helpful to a photographer or film student otherwise kind of limited but I like it. He could expand function a bit
First work on G watch R Uninstalling
